text: Tansalile (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) akusigalila munyuma (pangalongana namwe wa ku Maaka) mu warabu wanchimisi: “Yatuwijikenye ipanje yetu kwisa soni mawasa getu, basi tuwendelani chikululuko (kwa Allah).” Akuwecheta ni ndimi syao yanganiyiwa m’mitima mwao. Jilani: “Ana ni nduni jwampaka akombole kunkamuchisya chilichose kwa Allah nasakaga kumpa masausyo kapena nasakaga kunkamuchisya? Nambo Allah awele Jwaasimanya chenene abali syosope sya yankutenda.”
